description:
Switch component provides a toggle control for binary options.
It allows users to turn options on or off with a single action.
name: Switch

tags.name: example
example
tags.text:
With label description
<Switch
label="Dark mode"
labelDescription="(Applies to all users)"
checked={darkMode}
onChange={setDarkMode}
/>

tags.name: example
tags.text:
With subtitle
<Switch
label="Auto-save"
subtitle="Automatically save changes as you type"
checked={autoSave}
onChange={setAutoSave}
/>

tags.name: example
tags.text:
Disabled state
<Switch
label="Premium feature"
checked={true}
onChange={() => {}}
disabled
/>
